Summary: I spotted 2 spherical objects extremely high up moving as 1 strangely.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cary
There were no other sightings in Cary on or around December 27th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing with my dog in an open field around 12:30 or so in Cary, NC. I happened to look up and spotted a twinkle in the sky. I looked with more intensity and spotted 2 spherical objects which seemed to be moving in a cat and mouse way. I knew then that these were not airplanes, bugs, or delusions. One looped quickly around the other and then slowly faded behind the trees in the distance. They seemed to fly completely straight and together after a few seconds of me spotting them. The event lasted very briefly. One object was extremely reflective in that it caught my eye at a very high altitude. I had my phone with a built in camera and took a picture but it was just too high up.
